2619 static void clusterManagerShowClusterInfo(void) {
2620  int masters = 0;
2621  int keys = 0;
2622  listIter li;
2623  listNode *ln;
2624  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
2625  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
2626  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
2627  if (!(node->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE)) {
2628  if (!node->name) continue;
2629  int replicas = 0;
2630  int dbsize = -1;
2631  char name[9];
2632  memcpy(name, node->name, 8);
2633  name[8] = '\0';
2634  listIter ri;
2635  listNode *rn;
2636  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &ri);
2637  while ((rn = listNext(&ri)) != NULL) {
2638  clusterManagerNode *n = rn->value;
2639  if (n == node || !(n->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE))
2640  continue;
2641  if (n->replicate && !strcmp(n->replicate, node->name))
2642  replicas++;
2643  }
2644  redisReply *reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(node, "DBSIZE");
2645  if (reply != NULL || reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_INTEGER)
2646  dbsize = reply->integer;
2647  if (dbsize < 0) {
2648  char *err = "";
2649  if (reply != NULL && reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ERROR)
2650  err = reply->str;
2651  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(node, err);
2652  if (reply != NULL) freeReplyObject(reply);
2653  return;
2654  };
2655  if (reply != NULL) freeReplyObject(reply);
2656  printf("%s:%d (%s...) -> %d keys | %d slots | %d slaves.\n",
2657  node->ip, node->port, name, dbsize,
2658  node->slots_count, replicas);
2659  masters++;
2660  keys += dbsize;
2661  }
2662  }
2663  clusterManagerLogOk("[OK] %d keys in %d masters.\n", keys, masters);
2664  float keys_per_slot = keys / (float) CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS;
2665  printf("%.2f keys per slot on average.\n", keys_per_slot);
2666 }
2667 
2668 /* Flush dirty slots configuration of the node by calling CLUSTER ADDSLOTS */
2669 static int clusterManagerAddSlots(clusterManagerNode *node, char**err)
2670 {
2671  redisReply *reply = NULL;
2672  void *_reply = NULL;
2673  int success = 1;
2674  /* First two args are used for the command itself. */
2675  int argc = node->slots_count + 2;
2676  sds *argv = zmalloc(argc * sizeof(*argv));
2677  size_t *argvlen = zmalloc(argc * sizeof(*argvlen));
2678  argv[0] = "CLUSTER";
2679  argv[1] = "ADDSLOTS";
2680  argvlen[0] = 7;
2681  argvlen[1] = 8;
2682  *err = NULL;
2683  int i, argv_idx = 2;
2684  for (i = 0; i < CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS; i++) {
2685  if (argv_idx >= argc) break;
2686  if (node->slots[i]) {
2687  argv[argv_idx] = sdsfromlonglong((long long) i);
2688  argvlen[argv_idx] = sdslen(argv[argv_idx]);
2689  argv_idx++;
2690  }
2691  }
2692  if (!argv_idx) {
2693  success = 0;
2694  goto cleanup;
2695  }
2696  redisAppendCommandArgv(node->context,argc,(const char**)argv,argvlen);
2697  if (redisGetReply(node->context, &_reply) != REDIS_OK) {
2698  success = 0;
2699  goto cleanup;
2700  }
2701  reply = (redisReply*) _reply;
2702  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(node, reply, err);
2703 cleanup:
2704  zfree(argvlen);
2705  if (argv != NULL) {
2706  for (i = 2; i < argc; i++) sdsfree(argv[i]);
2707  zfree(argv);
2708  }
2709  if (reply != NULL) freeReplyObject(reply);
2710  return success;
2711 }
2712 
2713 /* Set slot status to "importing" or "migrating" */
2714 static int clusterManagerSetSlot(clusterManagerNode *node1,
2715  clusterManagerNode *node2,
2716  int slot, const char *status, char **err) {
2717  redisReply *reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(node1, "CLUSTER "
2718  "SETSLOT %d %s %s",
2719  slot, status,
2720  (char *) node2->name);
2721  if (err != NULL) *err = NULL;
2722  if (!reply) return 0;
2723  int success = 1;
2724  if (reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ERROR) {
2725  success = 0;
2726  if (err != NULL) {
2727  *err = zmalloc((reply->len + 1) * sizeof(char));
2728  strcpy(*err, reply->str);
2729  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(node1, err);
2730  }
2731  goto cleanup;
2732  }
2733 cleanup:
2734  freeReplyObject(reply);
2735  return success;
2736 }
2737 
2738 /* Migrate keys taken from reply->elements. It returns the reply from the
2739  * MIGRATE command, or NULL if something goes wrong. If the argument 'dots'
2740  * is not NULL, a dot will be printed for every migrated key. */
2741 static redisReply *clusterManagerMigrateKeysInReply(clusterManagerNode *source,
2742  clusterManagerNode *target,
2743  redisReply *reply,
2744  int replace, int timeout,
2745  char *dots)
2746 {
2747  redisReply *migrate_reply = NULL;
2748  char **argv = NULL;
2749  size_t *argv_len = NULL;
2750  int c = (replace ? 8 : 7);
2751  if (config.auth) c += 2;
2752  size_t argc = c + reply->elements;
2753  size_t i, offset = 6; // Keys Offset
2754  argv = zcalloc(argc * sizeof(char *));
2755  argv_len = zcalloc(argc * sizeof(size_t));
2756  char portstr[255];
2757  char timeoutstr[255];
2758  snprintf(portstr, 10, "%d", target->port);
2759  snprintf(timeoutstr, 10, "%d", timeout);
2760  argv[0] = "MIGRATE";
2761  argv_len[0] = 7;
2762  argv[1] = target->ip;
2763  argv_len[1] = strlen(target->ip);
2764  argv[2] = portstr;
2765  argv_len[2] = strlen(portstr);
2766  argv[3] = "";
2767  argv_len[3] = 0;
2768  argv[4] = "0";
2769  argv_len[4] = 1;
2770  argv[5] = timeoutstr;
2771  argv_len[5] = strlen(timeoutstr);
2772  if (replace) {
2773  argv[offset] = "REPLACE";
2774  argv_len[offset] = 7;
2775  offset++;
2776  }
2777  if (config.auth) {
2778  argv[offset] = "AUTH";
2779  argv_len[offset] = 4;
2780  offset++;
2781  argv[offset] = config.auth;
2782  argv_len[offset] = strlen(config.auth);
2783  offset++;
2784  }
2785  argv[offset] = "KEYS";
2786  argv_len[offset] = 4;
2787  offset++;
2788  for (i = 0; i < reply->elements; i++) {
2789  redisReply *entry = reply->element[i];
2790  size_t idx = i + offset;
2791  assert(entry->type == REDIS_REPLY_STRING);
2792  argv[idx] = (char *) sdsnew(entry->str);
2793  argv_len[idx] = entry->len;
2794  if (dots) dots[i] = '.';
2795  }
2796  if (dots) dots[reply->elements] = '\0';
2797  void *_reply = NULL;
2798  redisAppendCommandArgv(source->context,argc,
2799  (const char**)argv,argv_len);
2800  int success = (redisGetReply(source->context, &_reply) == REDIS_OK);
2801  for (i = 0; i < reply->elements; i++) sdsfree(argv[i + offset]);
2802  if (!success) goto cleanup;
2803  migrate_reply = (redisReply *) _reply;
2804 cleanup:
2805  zfree(argv);
2806  zfree(argv_len);
2807  return migrate_reply;
2808 }
2809 
2810 /* Migrate all keys in the given slot from source to target.*/
2811 static int clusterManagerMigrateKeysInSlot(clusterManagerNode *source,
2812  clusterManagerNode *target,
2813  int slot, int timeout,
2814  int pipeline, int verbose,
2815  char **err)
2816 {
2817  int success = 1;
2818  int do_fix = (config.cluster_manager_command.flags &
2819  CLUSTER_MANAGER_CMD_FLAG_FIX);
2820  while (1) {
2821  char *dots = NULL;
2822  redisReply *reply = NULL, *migrate_reply = NULL;
2823  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(source, "CLUSTER "
2824  "GETKEYSINSLOT %d %d", slot,
2825  pipeline);
2826  success = (reply != NULL);
2827  if (!success) return 0;
2828  if (reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ERROR) {
2829  success = 0;
2830  if (err != NULL) {
2831  *err = zmalloc((reply->len + 1) * sizeof(char));
2832  strcpy(*err, reply->str);
2833  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(source, err);
2834  }
2835  goto next;
2836  }
2837  assert(reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ARRAY);
2838  size_t count = reply->elements;
2839  if (count == 0) {
2840  freeReplyObject(reply);
2841  break;
2842  }
2843  if (verbose) dots = zmalloc((count+1) * sizeof(char));
2844  /* Calling MIGRATE command. */
2845  migrate_reply = clusterManagerMigrateKeysInReply(source, target,
2846  reply, 0, timeout,
2847  dots);
2848  if (migrate_reply == NULL) goto next;
2849  if (migrate_reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ERROR) {
2850  if (do_fix && strstr(migrate_reply->str, "BUSYKEY")) {
2851  clusterManagerLogWarn("*** Target key exists. "
2852  "Replacing it for FIX.\n");
2853  freeReplyObject(migrate_reply);
2854  /* Try to migrate keys adding REPLACE option. */
2855  migrate_reply = clusterManagerMigrateKeysInReply(source,
2856  target,
2857  reply,
2858  1, timeout,
2859  NULL);
2860  success = (migrate_reply != NULL &&
2861  migrate_reply->type != REDIS_REPLY_ERROR);
2862  } else success = 0;
2863  if (!success) {
2864  if (migrate_reply != NULL) {
2865  if (err) {
2866  *err = zmalloc((migrate_reply->len + 1) * sizeof(char));
2867  strcpy(*err, migrate_reply->str);
2868  }
2869  printf("\n");
2870  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(source,
2871  migrate_reply->str);
2872  }
2873  goto next;
2874  }
2875  }
2876  if (verbose) {
2877  printf("%s", dots);
2878  fflush(stdout);
2879  }
2880 next:
2881  if (reply != NULL) freeReplyObject(reply);
2882  if (migrate_reply != NULL) freeReplyObject(migrate_reply);
2883  if (dots) zfree(dots);
2884  if (!success) break;
2885  }
2886  return success;
2887 }
2888 
2889 /* Move slots between source and target nodes using MIGRATE.
2890  *
2891  * Options:
2892  * CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_VERBOSE -- Print a dot for every moved key.
2893  * CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_COLD -- Move keys without opening slots /
2894  * reconfiguring the nodes.
2895  * CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_UPDATE -- Update node->slots for source/target nodes.
2896  * CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_QUIET -- Don't print info messages.
2897 */
2898 static int clusterManagerMoveSlot(clusterManagerNode *source,
2899  clusterManagerNode *target,
2900  int slot, int opts, char**err)
2901 {
2902  if (!(opts & CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_QUIET)) {
2903  printf("Moving slot %d from %s:%d to %s:%d: ", slot, source->ip,
2904  source->port, target->ip, target->port);
2905  fflush(stdout);
2906  }
2907  if (err != NULL) *err = NULL;
2908  int pipeline = config.cluster_manager_command.pipeline,
2909  timeout = config.cluster_manager_command.timeout,
2910  print_dots = (opts & CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_VERBOSE),
2911  option_cold = (opts & CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_COLD),
2912  success = 1;
2913  if (!option_cold) {
2914  success = clusterManagerSetSlot(target, source, slot,
2915  "importing", err);
2916  if (!success) return 0;
2917  success = clusterManagerSetSlot(source, target, slot,
2918  "migrating", err);
2919  if (!success) return 0;
2920  }
2921  success = clusterManagerMigrateKeysInSlot(source, target, slot, timeout,
2922  pipeline, print_dots, err);
2923  if (!(opts & CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_QUIET)) printf("\n");
2924  if (!success) return 0;
2925  /* Set the new node as the owner of the slot in all the known nodes. */
2926  if (!option_cold) {
2927  listIter li;
2928  listNode *ln;
2929  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
2930  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
2931  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
2932  if (n->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE) continue;
2933  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n, "CLUSTER "
2934  "SETSLOT %d %s %s",
2935  slot, "node",
2936  target->name);
2937  success = (r != NULL);
2938  if (!success) return 0;
2939  if (r->type == REDIS_REPLY_ERROR) {
2940  success = 0;
2941  if (err != NULL) {
2942  *err = zmalloc((r->len + 1) * sizeof(char));
2943  strcpy(*err, r->str);
2944  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(n, err);
2945  }
2946  }
2947  freeReplyObject(r);
2948  if (!success) return 0;
2949  }
2950  }
2951  /* Update the node logical config */
2952  if (opts & CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_UPDATE) {
2953  source->slots[slot] = 0;
2954  target->slots[slot] = 1;
2955  }
2956  return 1;
2957 }
2958 
2959 /* Flush the dirty node configuration by calling replicate for slaves or
2960  * adding the slots defined in the masters. */
2961 static int clusterManagerFlushNodeConfig(clusterManagerNode *node, char **err) {
2962  if (!node->dirty) return 0;
2963  redisReply *reply = NULL;
2964  int is_err = 0, success = 1;
2965  if (err != NULL) *err = NULL;
2966  if (node->replicate != NULL) {
2967  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(node, "CLUSTER REPLICATE %s",
2968  node->replicate);
2969  if (reply == NULL || (is_err = (reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ERROR))) {
2970  if (is_err && err != NULL) {
2971  *err = zmalloc((reply->len + 1) * sizeof(char));
2972  strcpy(*err, reply->str);
2973  }
2974  success = 0;
2975  /* If the cluster did not already joined it is possible that
2976  * the slave does not know the master node yet. So on errors
2977  * we return ASAP leaving the dirty flag set, to flush the
2978  * config later. */
2979  goto cleanup;
2980  }
2981  } else {
2982  int added = clusterManagerAddSlots(node, err);
2983  if (!added || *err != NULL) success = 0;
2984  }
2985  node->dirty = 0;
2986 cleanup:
2987  if (reply != NULL) freeReplyObject(reply);
2988  return success;
2989 }

2991 /* Wait until the cluster configuration is consistent. */
2992 static void clusterManagerWaitForClusterJoin(void) {
2993  printf("Waiting for the cluster to join\n");
2994  while(!clusterManagerIsConfigConsistent()) {
2995  printf(".");
2996  fflush(stdout);
2997  sleep(1);
2998  }
2999  printf("\n");
3000 }

3002 /* Load node's cluster configuration by calling "CLUSTER NODES" command.
3003  * Node's configuration (name, replicate, slots, ...) is then updated.
3004  * If CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_GETFRIENDS flag is set into 'opts' argument,
3005  * and node already knows other nodes, the node's friends list is populated
3006  * with the other nodes info. */
3007 static int clusterManagerNodeLoadInfo(clusterManagerNode *node, int opts,
3008  char **err)
3009 {
3010  redisReply *reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(node, "CLUSTER NODES");
3011  int success = 1;
3012  *err = NULL;
3013  if (!clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(node, reply, err)) {
3014  success = 0;
3015  goto cleanup;
3016  }
3017  int getfriends = (opts & CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_GETFRIENDS);
3018  char *lines = reply->str, *p, *line;
3019  while ((p = strstr(lines, "\n")) != NULL) {
3020  *p = '\0';
3021  line = lines;
3022  lines = p + 1;
3023  char *name = NULL, *addr = NULL, *flags = NULL, *master_id = NULL,
3024  *ping_sent = NULL, *ping_recv = NULL, *config_epoch = NULL,
3025  *link_status = NULL;
3026  UNUSED(link_status);
3027  int i = 0;
3028  while ((p = strchr(line, ' ')) != NULL) {
3029  *p = '\0';
3030  char *token = line;
3031  line = p + 1;
3032  switch(i++){
3033  case 0: name = token; break;
3034  case 1: addr = token; break;
3035  case 2: flags = token; break;
3036  case 3: master_id = token; break;
3037  case 4: ping_sent = token; break;
3038  case 5: ping_recv = token; break;
3039  case 6: config_epoch = token; break;
3040  case 7: link_status = token; break;
3041  }
3042  if (i == 8) break; // Slots
3043  }
3044  if (!flags) {
3045  success = 0;
3046  goto cleanup;
3047  }
3048  int myself = (strstr(flags, "myself") != NULL);
3049  clusterManagerNode *currentNode = NULL;
3050  if (myself) {
3051  node->flags |= CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_MYSELF;
3052  currentNode = node;
3053  clusterManagerNodeResetSlots(node);
3054  if (i == 8) {
3055  int remaining = strlen(line);
3056  while (remaining > 0) {
3057  p = strchr(line, ' ');
3058  if (p == NULL) p = line + remaining;
3059  remaining -= (p - line);
3060 
3061  char *slotsdef = line;
3062  *p = '\0';
3063  if (remaining) {
3064  line = p + 1;
3065  remaining--;
3066  } else line = p;
3067  char *dash = NULL;
3068  if (slotsdef[0] == '[') {
3069  slotsdef++;
3070  if ((p = strstr(slotsdef, "->-"))) { // Migrating
3071  *p = '\0';
3072  p += 3;
3073  char *closing_bracket = strchr(p, ']');
3074  if (closing_bracket) *closing_bracket = '\0';
3075  sds slot = sdsnew(slotsdef);
3076  sds dst = sdsnew(p);
3077  node->migrating_count += 2;
3078  node->migrating = zrealloc(node->migrating,
3079  (node->migrating_count * sizeof(sds)));
3080  node->migrating[node->migrating_count - 2] =
3081  slot;
3082  node->migrating[node->migrating_count - 1] =
3083  dst;
3084  } else if ((p = strstr(slotsdef, "-<-"))) {//Importing
3085  *p = '\0';
3086  p += 3;
3087  char *closing_bracket = strchr(p, ']');
3088  if (closing_bracket) *closing_bracket = '\0';
3089  sds slot = sdsnew(slotsdef);
3090  sds src = sdsnew(p);
3091  node->importing_count += 2;
3092  node->importing = zrealloc(node->importing,
3093  (node->importing_count * sizeof(sds)));
3094  node->importing[node->importing_count - 2] =
3095  slot;
3096  node->importing[node->importing_count - 1] =
3097  src;
3098  }
3099  } else if ((dash = strchr(slotsdef, '-')) != NULL) {
3100  p = dash;
3101  int start, stop;
3102  *p = '\0';
3103  start = atoi(slotsdef);
3104  stop = atoi(p + 1);
3105  node->slots_count += (stop - (start - 1));
3106  while (start <= stop) node->slots[start++] = 1;
3107  } else if (p > slotsdef) {
3108  node->slots[atoi(slotsdef)] = 1;
3109  node->slots_count++;
3110  }
3111  }
3112  }
3113  node->dirty = 0;
3114  } else if (!getfriends) {
3115  if (!(node->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_MYSELF)) continue;
3116  else break;
3117  } else {
3118  if (addr == NULL) {
3119  fprintf(stderr, "Error: invalid CLUSTER NODES reply\n");
3120  success = 0;
3121  goto cleanup;
3122  }
3123  char *c = strrchr(addr, '@');
3124  if (c != NULL) *c = '\0';
3125  c = strrchr(addr, ':');
3126  if (c == NULL) {
3127  fprintf(stderr, "Error: invalid CLUSTER NODES reply\n");
3128  success = 0;
3129  goto cleanup;
3130  }
3131  *c = '\0';
3132  int port = atoi(++c);
3133  currentNode = clusterManagerNewNode(sdsnew(addr), port);
3134  currentNode->flags |= CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_FRIEND;
3135  if (node->friends == NULL) node->friends = listCreate();
3136  listAddNodeTail(node->friends, currentNode);
3137  }
3138  if (name != NULL) {
3139  if (currentNode->name) sdsfree(currentNode->name);
3140  currentNode->name = sdsnew(name);
3141  }
3142  if (currentNode->flags_str != NULL)
3143  freeClusterManagerNodeFlags(currentNode->flags_str);
3144  currentNode->flags_str = listCreate();
3145  int flag_len;
3146  while ((flag_len = strlen(flags)) > 0) {
3147  sds flag = NULL;
3148  char *fp = strchr(flags, ',');
3149  if (fp) {
3150  *fp = '\0';
3151  flag = sdsnew(flags);
3152  flags = fp + 1;
3153  } else {
3154  flag = sdsnew(flags);
3155  flags += flag_len;
3156  }
3157  if (strcmp(flag, "noaddr") == 0)
3158  currentNode->flags |= CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_NOADDR;
3159  else if (strcmp(flag, "disconnected") == 0)
3160  currentNode->flags |= CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_DISCONNECT;
3161  else if (strcmp(flag, "fail") == 0)
3162  currentNode->flags |= CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_FAIL;
3163  else if (strcmp(flag, "slave") == 0) {
3164  currentNode->flags |= CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE;
3165  if (master_id != NULL) {
3166  if (currentNode->replicate) sdsfree(currentNode->replicate);
3167  currentNode->replicate = sdsnew(master_id);
3168  }
3169  }
3170  listAddNodeTail(currentNode->flags_str, flag);
3171  }
3172  if (config_epoch != NULL)
3173  currentNode->current_epoch = atoll(config_epoch);
3174  if (ping_sent != NULL) currentNode->ping_sent = atoll(ping_sent);
3175  if (ping_recv != NULL) currentNode->ping_recv = atoll(ping_recv);
3176  if (!getfriends && myself) break;
3177  }
3178 cleanup:
3179  if (reply) freeReplyObject(reply);
3180  return success;
3181 }

3183 /* Retrieves info about the cluster using argument 'node' as the starting
3184  * point. All nodes will be loaded inside the cluster_manager.nodes list.
3185  * Warning: if something goes wrong, it will free the starting node before
3186  * returning 0. */
3187 static int clusterManagerLoadInfoFromNode(clusterManagerNode *node, int opts) {
3188  if (node->context == NULL && !clusterManagerNodeConnect(node)) {
3189  freeClusterManagerNode(node);
3190  return 0;
3191  }
3192  opts |= CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_GETFRIENDS;
3193  char *e = NULL;
3194  if (!clusterManagerNodeIsCluster(node, &e)) {
3195  clusterManagerPrintNotClusterNodeError(node, e);
3196  if (e) zfree(e);
3197  freeClusterManagerNode(node);
3198  return 0;
3199  }
3200  e = NULL;
3201  if (!clusterManagerNodeLoadInfo(node, opts, &e)) {
3202  if (e) {
3203  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(node, e);
3204  zfree(e);
3205  }
3206  freeClusterManagerNode(node);
3207  return 0;
3208  }
3209  listIter li;
3210  listNode *ln;
3211  if (cluster_manager.nodes != NULL) {
3212  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3213  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL)
3214  freeClusterManagerNode((clusterManagerNode *) ln->value);
3215  listRelease(cluster_manager.nodes);
3216  }
3217  cluster_manager.nodes = listCreate();
3218  listAddNodeTail(cluster_manager.nodes, node);
3219  if (node->friends != NULL) {
3220  listRewind(node->friends, &li);
3221  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3222  clusterManagerNode *friend = ln->value;
3223  if (!friend->ip || !friend->port) goto invalid_friend;
3224  if (!friend->context && !clusterManagerNodeConnect(friend))
3225  goto invalid_friend;
3226  e = NULL;
3227  if (clusterManagerNodeLoadInfo(friend, 0, &e)) {
3228  if (friend->flags & (CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_NOADDR |
3229  CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_DISCONNECT |
3230  CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_FAIL))
3231  goto invalid_friend;
3232  listAddNodeTail(cluster_manager.nodes, friend);
3233  } else {
3234  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] Unable to load info for "
3235  "node %s:%d\n",
3236  friend->ip, friend->port);
3237  goto invalid_friend;
3238  }
3239  continue;
3240 invalid_friend:
3241  freeClusterManagerNode(friend);
3242  }
3243  listRelease(node->friends);
3244  node->friends = NULL;
3245  }
3246  // Count replicas for each node
3247  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3248  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3249  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3250  if (n->replicate != NULL) {
3251  clusterManagerNode *master = clusterManagerNodeByName(n->replicate);
3252  if (master == NULL) {
3253  clusterManagerLogWarn("*** WARNING: %s:%d claims to be "
3254  "slave of unknown node ID %s.\n",
3255  n->ip, n->port, n->replicate);
3256  } else master->replicas_count++;
3257  }
3258  }
3259  return 1;
3260 }

3263 int clusterManagerSlotCompare(const void *slot1, const void *slot2) {
3264  const char **i1 = (const char **)slot1;
3265  const char **i2 = (const char **)slot2;
3266  return strcmp(*i1, *i2);
3267 }

3281 static sds clusterManagerGetConfigSignature(clusterManagerNode *node) {
3282  sds signature = NULL;
3283  int node_count = 0, i = 0, name_len = 0;
3284  char **node_configs = NULL;
3285  redisReply *reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(node, "CLUSTER NODES");
3286  if (reply == NULL || reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ERROR)
3287  goto cleanup;
3288  char *lines = reply->str, *p, *line;
3289  while ((p = strstr(lines, "\n")) != NULL) {
3290  i = 0;
3291  *p = '\0';
3292  line = lines;
3293  lines = p + 1;
3294  char *nodename = NULL;
3295  int tot_size = 0;
3296  while ((p = strchr(line, ' ')) != NULL) {
3297  *p = '\0';
3298  char *token = line;
3299  line = p + 1;
3300  if (i == 0) {
3301  nodename = token;
3302  tot_size = (p - token);
3303  name_len = tot_size++; // Make room for ':' in tot_size
3304  } else if (i == 8) break;
3305  i++;
3306  }
3307  if (i != 8) continue;
3308  if (nodename == NULL) continue;
3309  int remaining = strlen(line);
3310  if (remaining == 0) continue;
3311  char **slots = NULL;
3312  int c = 0;
3313  while (remaining > 0) {
3314  p = strchr(line, ' ');
3315  if (p == NULL) p = line + remaining;
3316  int size = (p - line);
3317  remaining -= size;
3318  tot_size += size;
3319  char *slotsdef = line;
3320  *p = '\0';
3321  if (remaining) {
3322  line = p + 1;
3323  remaining--;
3324  } else line = p;
3325  if (slotsdef[0] != '[') {
3326  c++;
3327  slots = zrealloc(slots, (c * sizeof(char *)));
3328  slots[c - 1] = slotsdef;
3329  }
3330  }
3331  if (c > 0) {
3332  if (c > 1)
3333  qsort(slots, c, sizeof(char *), clusterManagerSlotCompare);
3334  node_count++;
3335  node_configs =
3336  zrealloc(node_configs, (node_count * sizeof(char *)));
3337  /* Make room for '|' separators. */
3338  tot_size += (sizeof(char) * (c - 1));
3339  char *cfg = zmalloc((sizeof(char) * tot_size) + 1);
3340  memcpy(cfg, nodename, name_len);
3341  char *sp = cfg + name_len;
3342  *(sp++) = ':';
3343  for (i = 0; i < c; i++) {
3344  if (i > 0) *(sp++) = '|';
3345  int slen = strlen(slots[i]);
3346  memcpy(sp, slots[i], slen);
3347  sp += slen;
3348  }
3349  *(sp++) = '\0';
3350  node_configs[node_count - 1] = cfg;
3351  }
3352  zfree(slots);
3353  }
3354  if (node_count > 0) {
3355  if (node_count > 1) {
3356  qsort(node_configs, node_count, sizeof(char *),
3357  clusterManagerSlotCompare);
3358  }
3359  signature = sdsempty();
3360  for (i = 0; i < node_count; i++) {
3361  if (i > 0) signature = sdscatprintf(signature, "%c", '|');
3362  signature = sdscatfmt(signature, "%s", node_configs[i]);
3363  }
3364  }
3365 cleanup:
3366  if (reply != NULL) freeReplyObject(reply);
3367  if (node_configs != NULL) {
3368  for (i = 0; i < node_count; i++) zfree(node_configs[i]);
3369  zfree(node_configs);
3370  }
3371  return signature;
3372 }

3374 static int clusterManagerIsConfigConsistent(void) {
3375  if (cluster_manager.nodes == NULL) return 0;
3376  int consistent = (listLength(cluster_manager.nodes) <= 1);
3377  // If the Cluster has only one node, it's always consistent
3378  if (consistent) return 1;
3379  sds first_cfg = NULL;
3380  listIter li;
3381  listNode *ln;
3382  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3383  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3384  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
3385  sds cfg = clusterManagerGetConfigSignature(node);
3386  if (cfg == NULL) {
3387  consistent = 0;
3388  break;
3389  }
3390  if (first_cfg == NULL) first_cfg = cfg;
3391  else {
3392  consistent = !sdscmp(first_cfg, cfg);
3393  sdsfree(cfg);
3394  if (!consistent) break;
3395  }
3396  }
3397  if (first_cfg != NULL) sdsfree(first_cfg);
3398  return consistent;
3399 }

3409 /* Check the slots coverage of the cluster. The 'all_slots' argument must be
3410  * and array of 16384 bytes. Every covered slot will be set to 1 in the
3411  * 'all_slots' array. The function returns the total number if covered slots.*/
3412 static int clusterManagerGetCoveredSlots(char *all_slots) {
3413  if (cluster_manager.nodes == NULL) return 0;
3414  listIter li;
3415  listNode *ln;
3416  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3417  int totslots = 0, i;
3418  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3419  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
3420  for (i = 0; i < CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS; i++) {
3421  if (node->slots[i] && !all_slots[i]) {
3422  all_slots[i] = 1;
3423  totslots++;
3424  }
3425  }
3426  }
3427  return totslots;
3428 }

3444 /* Return the node, among 'nodes' with the greatest number of keys
3445  * in the specified slot. */
3446 static clusterManagerNode * clusterManagerGetNodeWithMostKeysInSlot(list *nodes,
3447  int slot,
3448  char **err)
3449 {
3450  clusterManagerNode *node = NULL;
3451  int numkeys = 0;
3452  listIter li;
3453  listNode *ln;
3454  listRewind(nodes, &li);
3455  if (err) *err = NULL;
3456  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3457  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3458  if (n->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE || n->replicate)
3459  continue;
3460  redisReply *r =
3461  CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n, "CLUSTER COUNTKEYSINSLOT %d", slot);
3462  int success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, err);
3463  if (success) {
3464  if (r->integer > numkeys || node == NULL) {
3465  numkeys = r->integer;
3466  node = n;
3467  }
3468  }
3469  if (r != NULL) freeReplyObject(r);
3470  /* If the reply contains errors */
3471  if (!success) {
3472  if (err != NULL && *err != NULL)
3473  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(n, err);
3474  node = NULL;
3475  break;
3476  }
3477  }
3478  return node;
3479 }

3481 /* This function returns the master that has the least number of replicas
3482  * in the cluster. If there are multiple masters with the same smaller
3483  * number of replicas, one at random is returned. */
3484 
3485 static clusterManagerNode *clusterManagerNodeWithLeastReplicas() {
3486  clusterManagerNode *node = NULL;
3487  int lowest_count = 0;
3488  listIter li;
3489  listNode *ln;
3490  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3491  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3492  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3493  if (n->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE) continue;
3494  if (node == NULL || n->replicas_count < lowest_count) {
3495  node = n;
3496  lowest_count = n->replicas_count;
3497  }
3498  }
3499  return node;
3500 }

3502 static int clusterManagerFixSlotsCoverage(char *all_slots) {
3503  int i, fixed = 0;
3504  list *none = NULL, *single = NULL, *multi = NULL;
3505  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Fixing slots coverage...\n");
3506  printf("List of not covered slots: \n");
3507  int uncovered_count = 0;
3508  sds log = sdsempty();
3509  for (i = 0; i < CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS; i++) {
3510  int covered = all_slots[i];
3511  if (!covered) {
3512  sds key = sdsfromlonglong((long long) i);
3513  if (uncovered_count++ > 0) printf(",");
3514  printf("%s", (char *) key);
3515  list *slot_nodes = listCreate();
3516  sds slot_nodes_str = sdsempty();
3517  listIter li;
3518  listNode *ln;
3519  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3520  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3521  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3522  if (n->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE || n->replicate)
3523  continue;
3524  redisReply *reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n,
3525  "CLUSTER GETKEYSINSLOT %d %d", i, 1);
3526  if (!clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, reply, NULL)) {
3527  fixed = -1;
3528  if (reply) freeReplyObject(reply);
3529  goto cleanup;
3530  }
3531  assert(reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ARRAY);
3532  if (reply->elements > 0) {
3533  listAddNodeTail(slot_nodes, n);
3534  if (listLength(slot_nodes) > 1)
3535  slot_nodes_str = sdscat(slot_nodes_str, ", ");
3536  slot_nodes_str = sdscatfmt(slot_nodes_str,
3537  "%s:%u", n->ip, n->port);
3538  }
3539  freeReplyObject(reply);
3540  }
3541  log = sdscatfmt(log, "\nSlot %S has keys in %u nodes: %S",
3542  key, listLength(slot_nodes), slot_nodes_str);
3543  sdsfree(slot_nodes_str);
3544  dictAdd(clusterManagerUncoveredSlots, key, slot_nodes);
3545  }
3546  }
3547  printf("\n%s\n", log);
3548  /* For every slot, take action depending on the actual condition:
3549  * 1) No node has keys for this slot.
3550  * 2) A single node has keys for this slot.
3551  * 3) Multiple nodes have keys for this slot. */
3552  none = listCreate();
3553  single = listCreate();
3554  multi = listCreate();
3555  dictIterator *iter = dictGetIterator(clusterManagerUncoveredSlots);
3556  dictEntry *entry;
3557  while ((entry = dictNext(iter)) != NULL) {
3558  sds slot = (sds) dictGetKey(entry);
3559  list *nodes = (list *) dictGetVal(entry);
3560  switch (listLength(nodes)){
3561  case 0: listAddNodeTail(none, slot); break;
3562  case 1: listAddNodeTail(single, slot); break;
3563  default: listAddNodeTail(multi, slot); break;
3564  }
3565  }
3566  dictReleaseIterator(iter);
3567 
3568  /* Handle case "1": keys in no node. */
3569  if (listLength(none) > 0) {
3570  printf("The following uncovered slots have no keys "
3571  "across the cluster:\n");
3572  clusterManagerPrintSlotsList(none);
3573  if (confirmWithYes("Fix these slots by covering with a random node?")){
3574  srand(time(NULL));
3575  listIter li;
3576  listNode *ln;
3577  listRewind(none, &li);
3578  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3579  sds slot = ln->value;
3580  long idx = (long) (rand() % listLength(cluster_manager.nodes));
3581  listNode *node_n = listIndex(cluster_manager.nodes, idx);
3582  assert(node_n != NULL);
3583  clusterManagerNode *n = node_n->value;
3584  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Covering slot %s with %s:%d\n",
3585  slot, n->ip, n->port);
3586  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n,
3587  "CLUSTER ADDSLOTS %s", slot);
3588  if (!clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, NULL)) fixed = -1;
3589  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
3590  if (fixed < 0) goto cleanup;
3591  /* Since CLUSTER ADDSLOTS succeeded, we also update the slot
3592  * info into the node struct, in order to keep it synced */
3593  n->slots[atoi(slot)] = 1;
3594  fixed++;
3595  }
3596  }
3597  }
3598 
3599  /* Handle case "2": keys only in one node. */
3600  if (listLength(single) > 0) {
3601  printf("The following uncovered slots have keys in just one node:\n");
3602  clusterManagerPrintSlotsList(single);
3603  if (confirmWithYes("Fix these slots by covering with those nodes?")){
3604  listIter li;
3605  listNode *ln;
3606  listRewind(single, &li);
3607  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3608  sds slot = ln->value;
3609  dictEntry *entry = dictFind(clusterManagerUncoveredSlots, slot);
3610  assert(entry != NULL);
3611  list *nodes = (list *) dictGetVal(entry);
3612  listNode *fn = listFirst(nodes);
3613  assert(fn != NULL);
3614  clusterManagerNode *n = fn->value;
3615  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Covering slot %s with %s:%d\n",
3616  slot, n->ip, n->port);
3617  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n,
3618  "CLUSTER ADDSLOTS %s", slot);
3619  if (!clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, NULL)) fixed = -1;
3620  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
3621  if (fixed < 0) goto cleanup;
3622  /* Since CLUSTER ADDSLOTS succeeded, we also update the slot
3623  * info into the node struct, in order to keep it synced */
3624  n->slots[atoi(slot)] = 1;
3625  fixed++;
3626  }
3627  }
3628  }
3629 
3630  /* Handle case "3": keys in multiple nodes. */
3631  if (listLength(multi) > 0) {
3632  printf("The following uncovered slots have keys in multiple nodes:\n");
3633  clusterManagerPrintSlotsList(multi);
3634  if (confirmWithYes("Fix these slots by moving keys "
3635  "into a single node?")) {
3636  listIter li;
3637  listNode *ln;
3638  listRewind(multi, &li);
3639  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3640  sds slot = ln->value;
3641  dictEntry *entry = dictFind(clusterManagerUncoveredSlots, slot);
3642  assert(entry != NULL);
3643  list *nodes = (list *) dictGetVal(entry);
3644  int s = atoi(slot);
3645  clusterManagerNode *target =
3646  clusterManagerGetNodeWithMostKeysInSlot(nodes, s, NULL);
3647  if (target == NULL) {
3648  fixed = -1;
3649  goto cleanup;
3650  }
3651  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Covering slot %s moving keys "
3652  "to %s:%d\n", slot,
3653  target->ip, target->port);
3654  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(target,
3655  "CLUSTER ADDSLOTS %s", slot);
3656  if (!clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(target, r, NULL)) fixed = -1;
3657  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
3658  if (fixed < 0) goto cleanup;
3659  r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(target,
3660  "CLUSTER SETSLOT %s %s", slot, "STABLE");
3661  if (!clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(target, r, NULL)) fixed = -1;
3662  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
3663  if (fixed < 0) goto cleanup;
3664  /* Since CLUSTER ADDSLOTS succeeded, we also update the slot
3665  * info into the node struct, in order to keep it synced */
3666  target->slots[atoi(slot)] = 1;
3667  listIter nli;
3668  listNode *nln;
3669  listRewind(nodes, &nli);
3670  while ((nln = listNext(&nli)) != NULL) {
3671  clusterManagerNode *src = nln->value;
3672  if (src == target) continue;
3673  /* Set the source node in 'importing' state
3674  * (even if we will actually migrate keys away)
3675  * in order to avoid receiving redirections
3676  * for MIGRATE. */
3677  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(src,
3678  "CLUSTER SETSLOT %s %s %s", slot,
3679  "IMPORTING", target->name);
3680  if (!clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(target, r, NULL))
3681  fixed = -1;
3682  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
3683  if (fixed < 0) goto cleanup;
3684  int opts = CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_VERBOSE |
3685  CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_COLD;
3686  if (!clusterManagerMoveSlot(src, target, s, opts, NULL)) {
3687  fixed = -1;
3688  goto cleanup;
3689  }
3690  }
3691  fixed++;
3692  }
3693  }
3694  }
3695 cleanup:
3696  sdsfree(log);
3697  if (none) listRelease(none);
3698  if (single) listRelease(single);
3699  if (multi) listRelease(multi);
3700  return fixed;
3701 }
3702 
3703 /* Slot 'slot' was found to be in importing or migrating state in one or
3704  * more nodes. This function fixes this condition by migrating keys where
3705  * it seems more sensible. */
3706 static int clusterManagerFixOpenSlot(int slot) {
3707  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Fixing open slot %d\n", slot);
3708  /* Try to obtain the current slot owner, according to the current
3709  * nodes configuration. */
3710  int success = 1;
3711  list *owners = listCreate();
3712  list *migrating = listCreate();
3713  list *importing = listCreate();
3714  sds migrating_str = sdsempty();
3715  sds importing_str = sdsempty();
3716  clusterManagerNode *owner = NULL;
3717  listIter li;
3718  listNode *ln;
3719  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3720  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3721  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3722  if (n->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE) continue;
3723  if (n->slots[slot]) {
3724  if (owner == NULL) owner = n;
3725  listAddNodeTail(owners, n);
3726  }
3727  }
3728  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3729  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3730  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3731  if (n->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE) continue;
3732  int is_migrating = 0, is_importing = 0;
3733  if (n->migrating) {
3734  for (int i = 0; i < n->migrating_count; i += 2) {
3735  sds migrating_slot = n->migrating[i];
3736  if (atoi(migrating_slot) == slot) {
3737  char *sep = (listLength(migrating) == 0 ? "" : ",");
3738  migrating_str = sdscatfmt(migrating_str, "%s%S:%u",
3739  sep, n->ip, n->port);
3740  listAddNodeTail(migrating, n);
3741  is_migrating = 1;
3742  break;
3743  }
3744  }
3745  }
3746  if (!is_migrating && n->importing) {
3747  for (int i = 0; i < n->importing_count; i += 2) {
3748  sds importing_slot = n->importing[i];
3749  if (atoi(importing_slot) == slot) {
3750  char *sep = (listLength(importing) == 0 ? "" : ",");
3751  importing_str = sdscatfmt(importing_str, "%s%S:%u",
3752  sep, n->ip, n->port);
3753  listAddNodeTail(importing, n);
3754  is_importing = 1;
3755  break;
3756  }
3757  }
3758  }
3759  /* If the node is neither migrating nor importing and it's not
3760  * the owner, then is added to the importing list in case
3761  * it has keys in the slot. */
3762  if (!is_migrating && !is_importing && n != owner) {
3763  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n,
3764  "CLUSTER COUNTKEYSINSLOT %d", slot);
3765  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, NULL);
3766  if (success && r->integer > 0) {
3767  clusterManagerLogWarn("*** Found keys about slot %d "
3768  "in node %s:%d!\n", slot, n->ip,
3769  n->port);
3770  listAddNodeTail(importing, n);
3771  }
3772  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
3773  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3774  }
3775  }
3776  printf("Set as migrating in: %s\n", migrating_str);
3777  printf("Set as importing in: %s\n", importing_str);
3778  /* If there is no slot owner, set as owner the slot with the biggest
3779  * number of keys, among the set of migrating / importing nodes. */
3780  if (owner == NULL) {
3781  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Nobody claims ownership, "
3782  "selecting an owner...\n");
3783  owner = clusterManagerGetNodeWithMostKeysInSlot(cluster_manager.nodes,
3784  slot, NULL);
3785  // If we still don't have an owner, we can't fix it.
3786  if (owner == NULL) {
3787  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] Can't select a slot owner. "
3788  "Impossible to fix.\n");
3789  success = 0;
3790  goto cleanup;
3791  }
3792 
3793  // Use ADDSLOTS to assign the slot.
3794  clusterManagerLogWarn("*** Configuring %s:%d as the slot owner\n",
3795  owner->ip, owner->port);
3796  redisReply *reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(owner, "CLUSTER "
3797  "SETSLOT %d %s",
3798  slot, "STABLE");
3799  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(owner, reply, NULL);
3800  if (reply) freeReplyObject(reply);
3801  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3802  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(owner, "CLUSTER ADDSLOTS %d", slot);
3803  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(owner, reply, NULL);
3804  if (reply) freeReplyObject(reply);
3805  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3806  /* Since CLUSTER ADDSLOTS succeeded, we also update the slot
3807  * info into the node struct, in order to keep it synced */
3808  owner->slots[slot] = 1;
3809  /* Make sure this information will propagate. Not strictly needed
3810  * since there is no past owner, so all the other nodes will accept
3811  * whatever epoch this node will claim the slot with. */
3812  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(owner, "CLUSTER BUMPEPOCH");
3813  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(owner, reply, NULL);
3814  if (reply) freeReplyObject(reply);
3815  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3816  /* Remove the owner from the list of migrating/importing
3817  * nodes. */
3818  clusterManagerRemoveNodeFromList(migrating, owner);
3819  clusterManagerRemoveNodeFromList(importing, owner);
3820  }
3821  /* If there are multiple owners of the slot, we need to fix it
3822  * so that a single node is the owner and all the other nodes
3823  * are in importing state. Later the fix can be handled by one
3824  * of the base cases above.
3825  *
3826  * Note that this case also covers multiple nodes having the slot
3827  * in migrating state, since migrating is a valid state only for
3828  * slot owners. */
3829  if (listLength(owners) > 1) {
3830  owner = clusterManagerGetNodeWithMostKeysInSlot(owners, slot, NULL);
3831  listRewind(owners, &li);
3832  redisReply *reply = NULL;
3833  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3834  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3835  if (n == owner) continue;
3836  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n, "CLUSTER DELSLOT %d", slot);
3837  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, reply, NULL);
3838  if (reply) freeReplyObject(reply);
3839  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3840  success = clusterManagerSetSlot(n, owner, slot, "importing", NULL);
3841  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3842  clusterManagerRemoveNodeFromList(importing, n); //Avoid duplicates
3843  listAddNodeTail(importing, n);
3844  }
3845  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(owner, "CLUSTER BUMPEPOCH");
3846  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(owner, reply, NULL);
3847  if (reply) freeReplyObject(reply);
3848  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3849  }
3850  int move_opts = CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_VERBOSE;
3851  /* Case 1: The slot is in migrating state in one slot, and in
3852  * importing state in 1 slot. That's trivial to address. */
3853  if (listLength(migrating) == 1 && listLength(importing) == 1) {
3854  clusterManagerNode *src = listFirst(migrating)->value;
3855  clusterManagerNode *dst = listFirst(importing)->value;
3856  success = clusterManagerMoveSlot(src, dst, slot, move_opts, NULL);
3857  }
3858  /* Case 2: There are multiple nodes that claim the slot as importing,
3859  * they probably got keys about the slot after a restart so opened
3860  * the slot. In this case we just move all the keys to the owner
3861  * according to the configuration. */
3862  else if (listLength(migrating) == 0 && listLength(importing) > 0) {
3863  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Moving all the %d slot keys to its "
3864  "owner %s:%d\n", slot, owner->ip, owner->port);
3865  move_opts |= CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_COLD;
3866  listRewind(importing, &li);
3867  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3868  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3869  if (n == owner) continue;
3870  success = clusterManagerMoveSlot(n, owner, slot, move_opts, NULL);
3871  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3872  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Setting %d as STABLE in "
3873  "%s:%d\n", slot, n->ip, n->port);
3874 
3875  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n, "CLUSTER SETSLOT %d %s",
3876  slot, "STABLE");
3877  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, NULL);
3878  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
3879  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3880  }
3881  } else {
3882  int try_to_close_slot = (listLength(importing) == 0 &&
3883  listLength(migrating) == 1);
3884  if (try_to_close_slot) {
3885  clusterManagerNode *n = listFirst(migrating)->value;
3886  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n,
3887  "CLUSTER GETKEYSINSLOT %d %d", slot, 10);
3888  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, NULL);
3889  if (r) {
3890  if (success) try_to_close_slot = (r->elements == 0);
3891  freeReplyObject(r);
3892  }
3893  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3894  }
3895  /* Case 3: There are no slots claiming to be in importing state, but
3896  * there is a migrating node that actually don't have any key. We
3897  * can just close the slot, probably a reshard interrupted in the middle. */
3898  if (try_to_close_slot) {
3899  clusterManagerNode *n = listFirst(migrating)->value;
3900  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n, "CLUSTER SETSLOT %d %s",
3901  slot, "STABLE");
3902  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, NULL);
3903  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
3904  if (!success) goto cleanup;
3905  } else {
3906  success = 0;
3907  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] Sorry, redis-cli can't fix this slot "
3908  "yet (work in progress). Slot is set as "
3909  "migrating in %s, as importing in %s, "
3910  "owner is %s:%d\n", migrating_str,
3911  importing_str, owner->ip, owner->port);
3912  }
3913  }
3914 cleanup:
3915  listRelease(owners);
3916  listRelease(migrating);
3917  listRelease(importing);
3918  sdsfree(migrating_str);
3919  sdsfree(importing_str);
3920  return success;
3921 }
3922 
3923 static int clusterManagerCheckCluster(int quiet) {
3924  listNode *ln = listFirst(cluster_manager.nodes);
3925  if (!ln) return 0;
3926  int result = 1;
3927  int do_fix = config.cluster_manager_command.flags &
3928  CLUSTER_MANAGER_CMD_FLAG_FIX;
3929  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
3930  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Performing Cluster Check (using node %s:%d)\n",
3931  node->ip, node->port);
3932  if (!quiet) clusterManagerShowNodes();
3933  if (!clusterManagerIsConfigConsistent()) {
3934  sds err = sdsnew("[ERR] Nodes don't agree about configuration!");
3935  clusterManagerOnError(err);
3936  result = 0;
3937  } else {
3938  clusterManagerLogOk("[OK] All nodes agree about slots "
3939  "configuration.\n");
3940  }
3941  // Check open slots
3942  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Check for open slots...\n");
3943  listIter li;
3944  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
3945  int i;
3946  dict *open_slots = NULL;
3947  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
3948  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
3949  if (n->migrating != NULL) {
3950  if (open_slots == NULL)
3951  open_slots = dictCreate(&clusterManagerDictType, NULL);
3952  sds errstr = sdsempty();
3953  errstr = sdscatprintf(errstr,
3954  "[WARNING] Node %s:%d has slots in "
3955  "migrating state ",
3956  n->ip,
3957  n->port);
3958  for (i = 0; i < n->migrating_count; i += 2) {
3959  sds slot = n->migrating[i];
3960  dictAdd(open_slots, slot, sdsdup(n->migrating[i + 1]));
3961  char *fmt = (i > 0 ? ",%S" : "%S");
3962  errstr = sdscatfmt(errstr, fmt, slot);
3963  }
3964  errstr = sdscat(errstr, ".");
3965  clusterManagerOnError(errstr);
3966  }
3967  if (n->importing != NULL) {
3968  if (open_slots == NULL)
3969  open_slots = dictCreate(&clusterManagerDictType, NULL);
3970  sds errstr = sdsempty();
3971  errstr = sdscatprintf(errstr,
3972  "[WARNING] Node %s:%d has slots in "
3973  "importing state ",
3974  n->ip,
3975  n->port);
3976  for (i = 0; i < n->importing_count; i += 2) {
3977  sds slot = n->importing[i];
3978  dictAdd(open_slots, slot, sdsdup(n->importing[i + 1]));
3979  char *fmt = (i > 0 ? ",%S" : "%S");
3980  errstr = sdscatfmt(errstr, fmt, slot);
3981  }
3982  errstr = sdscat(errstr, ".");
3983  clusterManagerOnError(errstr);
3984  }
3985  }
3986  if (open_slots != NULL) {
3987  result = 0;
3988  dictIterator *iter = dictGetIterator(open_slots);
3989  dictEntry *entry;
3990  sds errstr = sdsnew("[WARNING] The following slots are open: ");
3991  i = 0;
3992  while ((entry = dictNext(iter)) != NULL) {
3993  sds slot = (sds) dictGetKey(entry);
3994  char *fmt = (i++ > 0 ? ",%S" : "%S");
3995  errstr = sdscatfmt(errstr, fmt, slot);
3996  }
3997  clusterManagerLogErr("%s.\n", (char *) errstr);
3998  sdsfree(errstr);
3999  if (do_fix) {
4000  // Fix open slots.
4001  dictReleaseIterator(iter);
4002  iter = dictGetIterator(open_slots);
4003  while ((entry = dictNext(iter)) != NULL) {
4004  sds slot = (sds) dictGetKey(entry);
4005  result = clusterManagerFixOpenSlot(atoi(slot));
4006  if (!result) break;
4007  }
4008  }
4009  dictReleaseIterator(iter);
4010  dictRelease(open_slots);
4011  }
4012  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Check slots coverage...\n");
4013  char slots[CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS];
4014  memset(slots, 0, CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS);
4015  int coverage = clusterManagerGetCoveredSlots(slots);
4016  if (coverage == CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS) {
4017  clusterManagerLogOk("[OK] All %d slots covered.\n",
4018  CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS);
4019  } else {
4020  sds err = sdsempty();
4021  err = sdscatprintf(err, "[ERR] Not all %d slots are "
4022  "covered by nodes.\n",
4023  CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS);
4024  clusterManagerOnError(err);
4025  result = 0;
4026  if (do_fix/* && result*/) {
4027  dictType dtype = clusterManagerDictType;
4028  dtype.valDestructor = dictListDestructor;
4029  clusterManagerUncoveredSlots = dictCreate(&dtype, NULL);
4030  int fixed = clusterManagerFixSlotsCoverage(slots);
4031  if (fixed > 0) result = 1;
4032  }
4033  }
4034  return result;
4035 }
4036 
4037 static clusterManagerNode *clusterNodeForResharding(char *id,
4038  clusterManagerNode *target,
4039  int *raise_err)
4040 {
4041  clusterManagerNode *node = NULL;
4042  const char *invalid_node_msg = "*** The specified node (%s) is not known "
4043  "or not a master, please retry.\n";
4044  node = clusterManagerNodeByName(id);
4045  *raise_err = 0;
4046  if (!node || node->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE) {
4047  clusterManagerLogErr(invalid_node_msg, id);
4048  *raise_err = 1;
4049  return NULL;
4050  } else if (node != NULL && target != NULL) {
4051  if (!strcmp(node->name, target->name)) {
4052  clusterManagerLogErr( "*** It is not possible to use "
4053  "the target node as "
4054  "source node.\n");
4055  return NULL;
4056  }
4057  }
4058  return node;
4059 }
4060 
4061 static list *clusterManagerComputeReshardTable(list *sources, int numslots) {
4062  list *moved = listCreate();
4063  int src_count = listLength(sources), i = 0, tot_slots = 0, j;
4064  clusterManagerNode **sorted = zmalloc(src_count * sizeof(**sorted));
4065  listIter li;
4066  listNode *ln;
4067  listRewind(sources, &li);
4068  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4069  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
4070  tot_slots += node->slots_count;
4071  sorted[i++] = node;
4072  }
4073  qsort(sorted, src_count, sizeof(clusterManagerNode *),
4074  clusterManagerSlotCountCompareDesc);
4075  for (i = 0; i < src_count; i++) {
4076  clusterManagerNode *node = sorted[i];
4077  float n = ((float) numslots / tot_slots * node->slots_count);
4078  if (i == 0) n = ceil(n);
4079  else n = floor(n);
4080  int max = (int) n, count = 0;
4081  for (j = 0; j < CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS; j++) {
4082  int slot = node->slots[j];
4083  if (!slot) continue;
4084  if (count >= max || (int)listLength(moved) >= numslots) break;
4085  clusterManagerReshardTableItem *item = zmalloc(sizeof(*item));
4086  item->source = node;
4087  item->slot = j;
4088  listAddNodeTail(moved, item);
4089  count++;
4090  }
4091  }
4092  zfree(sorted);
4093  return moved;
4094 }
4095 
4096 static void clusterManagerShowReshardTable(list *table) {
4097  listIter li;
4098  listNode *ln;
4099  listRewind(table, &li);
4100  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4101  clusterManagerReshardTableItem *item = ln->value;
4102  clusterManagerNode *n = item->source;
4103  printf(" Moving slot %d from %s\n", item->slot, (char *) n->name);
4104  }
4105 }
4106 
4107 static void clusterManagerReleaseReshardTable(list *table) {
4108  if (table != NULL) {
4109  listIter li;
4110  listNode *ln;
4111  listRewind(table, &li);
4112  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4113  clusterManagerReshardTableItem *item = ln->value;
4114  zfree(item);
4115  }
4116  listRelease(table);
4117  }
4118 }
4119 
4120 static void clusterManagerLog(int level, const char* fmt, ...) {
4121  int use_colors =
4122  (config.cluster_manager_command.flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_CMD_FLAG_COLOR);
4123  if (use_colors) {
4124  printf("\033[");
4125  switch (level) {
4126  case CLUSTER_MANAGER_LOG_LVL_INFO: printf(LOG_COLOR_BOLD); break;
4127  case CLUSTER_MANAGER_LOG_LVL_WARN: printf(LOG_COLOR_YELLOW); break;
4128  case CLUSTER_MANAGER_LOG_LVL_ERR: printf(LOG_COLOR_RED); break;
4129  case CLUSTER_MANAGER_LOG_LVL_SUCCESS: printf(LOG_COLOR_GREEN); break;
4130  default: printf(LOG_COLOR_RESET); break;
4131  }
4132  }
4133  va_list ap;
4134  va_start(ap, fmt);
4135  vprintf(fmt, ap);
4136  va_end(ap);
4137  if (use_colors) printf("\033[" LOG_COLOR_RESET);
4138 }
4139 
4140 static void clusterManagerNodeArrayInit(clusterManagerNodeArray *array,
4141  int alloc_len)
4142 {
4143  array->nodes = zcalloc(alloc_len * sizeof(clusterManagerNode*));
4144  array->alloc = array->nodes;
4145  array->len = alloc_len;
4146  array->count = 0;
4147 }
4148 
4149 /* Reset array->nodes to the original array allocation and re-count non-NULL
4150  * nodes. */
4151 static void clusterManagerNodeArrayReset(clusterManagerNodeArray *array) {
4152  if (array->nodes > array->alloc) {
4153  array->len = array->nodes - array->alloc;
4154  array->nodes = array->alloc;
4155  array->count = 0;
4156  int i = 0;
4157  for(; i < array->len; i++) {
4158  if (array->nodes[i] != NULL) array->count++;
4159  }
4160  }
4161 }
4162 
4163 /* Shift array->nodes and store the shifted node into 'nodeptr'. */
4164 static void clusterManagerNodeArrayShift(clusterManagerNodeArray *array,
4165  clusterManagerNode **nodeptr)
4166 {
4167  assert(array->nodes < (array->nodes + array->len));
4168  /* If the first node to be shifted is not NULL, decrement count. */
4169  if (*array->nodes != NULL) array->count--;
4170  /* Store the first node to be shifted into 'nodeptr'. */
4171  *nodeptr = *array->nodes;
4172  /* Shift the nodes array and decrement length. */
4173  array->nodes++;
4174  array->len--;
4175 }
4176 
4177 static void clusterManagerNodeArrayAdd(clusterManagerNodeArray *array,
4178  clusterManagerNode *node)
4179 {
4180  assert(array->nodes < (array->nodes + array->len));
4181  assert(node != NULL);
4182  assert(array->count < array->len);
4183  array->nodes[array->count++] = node;
4184 }
4185 
4186 static void clusterManagerPrintNotEmptyNodeError(clusterManagerNode *node,
4187  char *err)
4188 {
4189  char *msg;
4190  if (err) msg = err;
4191  else {
4192  msg = "is not empty. Either the node already knows other "
4193  "nodes (check with CLUSTER NODES) or contains some "
4194  "key in database 0.";
4195  }
4196  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] Node %s:%d %s\n", node->ip, node->port, msg);
4197 }
4198 
4199 static void clusterManagerPrintNotClusterNodeError(clusterManagerNode *node,
4200  char *err)
4201 {
4202  char *msg = (err ? err : "is not configured as a cluster node.");
4203  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] Node %s:%d %s\n", node->ip, node->port, msg);
4204 }

4206 /* Execute redis-cli in Cluster Manager mode */
4207 static void clusterManagerMode(clusterManagerCommandProc *proc) {
4208  int argc = config.cluster_manager_command.argc;
4209  char **argv = config.cluster_manager_command.argv;
4210  cluster_manager.nodes = NULL;
4211  if (!proc(argc, argv)) goto cluster_manager_err;
4212  freeClusterManager();
4213  exit(0);
4214 cluster_manager_err:
4215  freeClusterManager();
4216  sdsfree(config.hostip);
4217  sdsfree(config.mb_delim);
4218  exit(1);
4219 }
4220 
4221 /* Cluster Manager Commands */
4222 
4223 static int clusterManagerCommandCreate(int argc, char **argv) {
4224  int i, j, success = 1;
4225  cluster_manager.nodes = listCreate();
4226  for (i = 0; i < argc; i++) {
4227  char *addr = argv[i];
4228  char *c = strrchr(addr, '@');
4229  if (c != NULL) *c = '\0';
4230  c = strrchr(addr, ':');
4231  if (c == NULL) {
4232  fprintf(stderr, "Invalid address format: %s\n", addr);
4233  return 0;
4234  }
4235  *c = '\0';
4236  char *ip = addr;
4237  int port = atoi(++c);
4238  clusterManagerNode *node = clusterManagerNewNode(ip, port);
4239  if (!clusterManagerNodeConnect(node)) {
4240  freeClusterManagerNode(node);
4241  return 0;
4242  }
4243  char *err = NULL;
4244  if (!clusterManagerNodeIsCluster(node, &err)) {
4245  clusterManagerPrintNotClusterNodeError(node, err);
4246  if (err) zfree(err);
4247  freeClusterManagerNode(node);
4248  return 0;
4249  }
4250  err = NULL;
4251  if (!clusterManagerNodeLoadInfo(node, 0, &err)) {
4252  if (err) {
4253  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(node, err);
4254  zfree(err);
4255  }
4256  freeClusterManagerNode(node);
4257  return 0;
4258  }
4259  err = NULL;
4260  if (!clusterManagerNodeIsEmpty(node, &err)) {
4261  clusterManagerPrintNotEmptyNodeError(node, err);
4262  if (err) zfree(err);
4263  freeClusterManagerNode(node);
4264  return 0;
4265  }
4266  listAddNodeTail(cluster_manager.nodes, node);
4267  }
4268  int node_len = cluster_manager.nodes->len;
4269  int replicas = config.cluster_manager_command.replicas;
4270  int masters_count = CLUSTER_MANAGER_MASTERS_COUNT(node_len, replicas);
4271  if (masters_count < 3) {
4272  clusterManagerLogErr(
4273  "*** ERROR: Invalid configuration for cluster creation.\n"
4274  "*** Redis Cluster requires at least 3 master nodes.\n"
4275  "*** This is not possible with %d nodes and %d replicas per node.",
4276  node_len, replicas);
4277  clusterManagerLogErr("\n*** At least %d nodes are required.\n",
4278  3 * (replicas + 1));
4279  return 0;
4280  }
4281  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Performing hash slots allocation "
4282  "on %d nodes...\n", node_len);
4283  int interleaved_len = 0, ip_count = 0;
4284  clusterManagerNode **interleaved = zcalloc(node_len*sizeof(**interleaved));
4285  char **ips = zcalloc(node_len * sizeof(char*));
4286  clusterManagerNodeArray *ip_nodes = zcalloc(node_len * sizeof(*ip_nodes));
4287  listIter li;
4288  listNode *ln;
4289  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
4290  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4291  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
4292  int found = 0;
4293  for (i = 0; i < ip_count; i++) {
4294  char *ip = ips[i];
4295  if (!strcmp(ip, n->ip)) {
4296  found = 1;
4297  break;
4298  }
4299  }
4300  if (!found) {
4301  ips[ip_count++] = n->ip;
4302  }
4303  clusterManagerNodeArray *node_array = &(ip_nodes[i]);
4304  if (node_array->nodes == NULL)
4305  clusterManagerNodeArrayInit(node_array, node_len);
4306  clusterManagerNodeArrayAdd(node_array, n);
4307  }
4308  while (interleaved_len < node_len) {
4309  for (i = 0; i < ip_count; i++) {
4310  clusterManagerNodeArray *node_array = &(ip_nodes[i]);
4311  if (node_array->count > 0) {
4312  clusterManagerNode *n = NULL;
4313  clusterManagerNodeArrayShift(node_array, &n);
4314  interleaved[interleaved_len++] = n;
4315  }
4316  }
4317  }
4318  clusterManagerNode **masters = interleaved;
4319  interleaved += masters_count;
4320  interleaved_len -= masters_count;
4321  float slots_per_node = CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS / (float) masters_count;
4322  long first = 0;
4323  float cursor = 0.0f;
4324  for (i = 0; i < masters_count; i++) {
4325  clusterManagerNode *master = masters[i];
4326  long last = lround(cursor + slots_per_node - 1);
4327  if (last > CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS || i == (masters_count - 1))
4328  last = CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS - 1;
4329  if (last < first) last = first;
4330  printf("Master[%d] -> Slots %lu - %lu\n", i, first, last);
4331  master->slots_count = 0;
4332  for (j = first; j <= last; j++) {
4333  master->slots[j] = 1;
4334  master->slots_count++;
4335  }
4336  master->dirty = 1;
4337  first = last + 1;
4338  cursor += slots_per_node;
4339  }
4340 
4341  int assign_unused = 0, available_count = interleaved_len;
4342 assign_replicas:
4343  for (i = 0; i < masters_count; i++) {
4344  clusterManagerNode *master = masters[i];
4345  int assigned_replicas = 0;
4346  while (assigned_replicas < replicas) {
4347  if (available_count == 0) break;
4348  clusterManagerNode *found = NULL, *slave = NULL;
4349  int firstNodeIdx = -1;
4350  for (j = 0; j < interleaved_len; j++) {
4351  clusterManagerNode *n = interleaved[j];
4352  if (n == NULL) continue;
4353  if (strcmp(n->ip, master->ip)) {
4354  found = n;
4355  interleaved[j] = NULL;
4356  break;
4357  }
4358  if (firstNodeIdx < 0) firstNodeIdx = j;
4359  }
4360  if (found) slave = found;
4361  else if (firstNodeIdx >= 0) {
4362  slave = interleaved[firstNodeIdx];
4363  interleaved_len -= (interleaved - (interleaved + firstNodeIdx));
4364  interleaved += (firstNodeIdx + 1);
4365  }
4366  if (slave != NULL) {
4367  assigned_replicas++;
4368  available_count--;
4369  if (slave->replicate) sdsfree(slave->replicate);
4370  slave->replicate = sdsnew(master->name);
4371  slave->dirty = 1;
4372  } else break;
4373  printf("Adding replica %s:%d to %s:%d\n", slave->ip, slave->port,
4374  master->ip, master->port);
4375  if (assign_unused) break;
4376  }
4377  }
4378  if (!assign_unused && available_count > 0) {
4379  assign_unused = 1;
4380  printf("Adding extra replicas...\n");
4381  goto assign_replicas;
4382  }
4383  for (i = 0; i < ip_count; i++) {
4384  clusterManagerNodeArray *node_array = ip_nodes + i;
4385  clusterManagerNodeArrayReset(node_array);
4386  }
4387  clusterManagerOptimizeAntiAffinity(ip_nodes, ip_count);
4388  clusterManagerShowNodes();
4389  if (confirmWithYes("Can I set the above configuration?")) {
4390  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
4391  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4392  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
4393  char *err = NULL;
4394  int flushed = clusterManagerFlushNodeConfig(node, &err);
4395  if (!flushed && node->dirty && !node->replicate) {
4396  if (err != NULL) {
4397  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(node, err);
4398  zfree(err);
4399  }
4400  success = 0;
4401  goto cleanup;
4402  } else if (err != NULL) zfree(err);
4403  }
4404  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Nodes configuration updated\n");
4405  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Assign a different config epoch to "
4406  "each node\n");
4407  int config_epoch = 1;
4408  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
4409  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4410  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
4411  redisReply *reply = NULL;
4412  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(node,
4413  "cluster set-config-epoch %d",
4414  config_epoch++);
4415  if (reply != NULL) freeReplyObject(reply);
4416  }
4417  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Sending CLUSTER MEET messages to join "
4418  "the cluster\n");
4419  clusterManagerNode *first = NULL;
4420  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
4421  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4422  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
4423  if (first == NULL) {
4424  first = node;
4425  continue;
4426  }
4427  redisReply *reply = NULL;
4428  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(node, "cluster meet %s %d",
4429  first->ip, first->port);
4430  int is_err = 0;
4431  if (reply != NULL) {
4432  if ((is_err = reply->type == REDIS_REPLY_ERROR))
4433  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(node, reply->str);
4434  freeReplyObject(reply);
4435  } else {
4436  is_err = 1;
4437  fprintf(stderr, "Failed to send CLUSTER MEET command.\n");
4438  }
4439  if (is_err) {
4440  success = 0;
4441  goto cleanup;
4442  }
4443  }
4444  /* Give one second for the join to start, in order to avoid that
4445  * waiting for cluster join will find all the nodes agree about
4446  * the config as they are still empty with unassigned slots. */
4447  sleep(1);
4448  clusterManagerWaitForClusterJoin();
4449  /* Useful for the replicas */
4450  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
4451  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4452  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
4453  if (!node->dirty) continue;
4454  char *err = NULL;
4455  int flushed = clusterManagerFlushNodeConfig(node, &err);
4456  if (!flushed && !node->replicate) {
4457  if (err != NULL) {
4458  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(node, err);
4459  zfree(err);
4460  }
4461  success = 0;
4462  goto cleanup;
4463  }
4464  }
4465  // Reset Nodes
4466  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
4467  clusterManagerNode *first_node = NULL;
4468  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4469  clusterManagerNode *node = ln->value;
4470  if (!first_node) first_node = node;
4471  else freeClusterManagerNode(node);
4472  }
4473  listEmpty(cluster_manager.nodes);
4474  if (!clusterManagerLoadInfoFromNode(first_node, 0)) {
4475  success = 0;
4476  goto cleanup;
4477  }
4478  clusterManagerCheckCluster(0);
4479  }
4480 cleanup:
4481  /* Free everything */
4482  zfree(masters);
4483  zfree(ips);
4484  for (i = 0; i < node_len; i++) {
4485  clusterManagerNodeArray *node_array = ip_nodes + i;
4486  CLUSTER_MANAGER_NODE_ARRAY_FREE(node_array);
4487  }
4488  zfree(ip_nodes);
4489  return success;
4490 }
4491 
4492 static int clusterManagerCommandAddNode(int argc, char **argv) {
4493  int success = 1;
4494  redisReply *reply = NULL;
4495  char *ref_ip = NULL, *ip = NULL;
4496  int ref_port = 0, port = 0;
4497  if (!getClusterHostFromCmdArgs(argc - 1, argv + 1, &ref_ip, &ref_port))
4498  goto invalid_args;
4499  if (!getClusterHostFromCmdArgs(1, argv, &ip, &port))
4500  goto invalid_args;
4501  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Adding node %s:%d to cluster %s:%d\n", ip, port,
4502  ref_ip, ref_port);
4503  // Check the existing cluster
4504  clusterManagerNode *refnode = clusterManagerNewNode(ref_ip, ref_port);
4505  if (!clusterManagerLoadInfoFromNode(refnode, 0)) return 0;
4506  if (!clusterManagerCheckCluster(0)) return 0;
4507 
4508  /* If --cluster-master-id was specified, try to resolve it now so that we
4509  * abort before starting with the node configuration. */
4510  clusterManagerNode *master_node = NULL;
4511  if (config.cluster_manager_command.flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_CMD_FLAG_SLAVE) {
4512  char *master_id = config.cluster_manager_command.master_id;
4513  if (master_id != NULL) {
4514  master_node = clusterManagerNodeByName(master_id);
4515  if (master_node == NULL) {
4516  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] No such master ID %s\n", master_id);
4517  return 0;
4518  }
4519  } else {
4520  master_node = clusterManagerNodeWithLeastReplicas();
4521  assert(master_node != NULL);
4522  printf("Automatically selected master %s:%d\n", master_node->ip,
4523  master_node->port);
4524  }
4525  }
4526 
4527  // Add the new node
4528  clusterManagerNode *new_node = clusterManagerNewNode(ip, port);
4529  int added = 0;
4530  if (!clusterManagerNodeConnect(new_node)) {
4531  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] Sorry, can't connect to node %s:%d\n",
4532  ip, port);
4533  success = 0;
4534  goto cleanup;
4535  }
4536  char *err = NULL;
4537  if (!(success = clusterManagerNodeIsCluster(new_node, &err))) {
4538  clusterManagerPrintNotClusterNodeError(new_node, err);
4539  if (err) zfree(err);
4540  goto cleanup;
4541  }
4542  if (!clusterManagerNodeLoadInfo(new_node, 0, &err)) {
4543  if (err) {
4544  CLUSTER_MANAGER_PRINT_REPLY_ERROR(new_node, err);
4545  zfree(err);
4546  }
4547  success = 0;
4548  goto cleanup;
4549  }
4550  if (!(success = clusterManagerNodeIsEmpty(new_node, &err))) {
4551  clusterManagerPrintNotEmptyNodeError(new_node, err);
4552  if (err) zfree(err);
4553  goto cleanup;
4554  }
4555  clusterManagerNode *first = listFirst(cluster_manager.nodes)->value;
4556  listAddNodeTail(cluster_manager.nodes, new_node);
4557  added = 1;
4558 
4559  // Send CLUSTER MEET command to the new node
4560  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Send CLUSTER MEET to node %s:%d to make it "
4561  "join the cluster.\n", ip, port);
4562  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(new_node, "CLUSTER MEET %s %d",
4563  first->ip, first->port);
4564  if (!(success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(new_node, reply, NULL)))
4565  goto cleanup;
4566 
4567  /* Additional configuration is needed if the node is added as a slave. */
4568  if (master_node) {
4569  sleep(1);
4570  clusterManagerWaitForClusterJoin();
4571  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Configure node as replica of %s:%d.\n",
4572  master_node->ip, master_node->port);
4573  freeReplyObject(reply);
4574  reply = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(new_node, "CLUSTER REPLICATE %s",
4575  master_node->name);
4576  if (!(success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(new_node, reply, NULL)))
4577  goto cleanup;
4578  }
4579  clusterManagerLogOk("[OK] New node added correctly.\n");
4580 cleanup:
4581  if (!added && new_node) freeClusterManagerNode(new_node);
4582  if (reply) freeReplyObject(reply);
4583  return success;
4584 invalid_args:
4585  fprintf(stderr, CLUSTER_MANAGER_INVALID_HOST_ARG);
4586  return 0;
4587 }
4588 
4589 static int clusterManagerCommandDeleteNode(int argc, char **argv) {
4590  UNUSED(argc);
4591  int success = 1;
4592  int port = 0;
4593  char *ip = NULL;
4594  if (!getClusterHostFromCmdArgs(1, argv, &ip, &port)) goto invalid_args;
4595  char *node_id = argv[1];
4596  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Removing node %s from cluster %s:%d\n",
4597  node_id, ip, port);
4598  clusterManagerNode *ref_node = clusterManagerNewNode(ip, port);
4599  clusterManagerNode *node = NULL;
4600 
4601  // Load cluster information
4602  if (!clusterManagerLoadInfoFromNode(ref_node, 0)) return 0;
4603 
4604  // Check if the node exists and is not empty
4605  node = clusterManagerNodeByName(node_id);
4606  if (node == NULL) {
4607  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] No such node ID %s\n", node_id);
4608  return 0;
4609  }
4610  if (node->slots_count != 0) {
4611  clusterManagerLogErr("[ERR] Node %s:%d is not empty! Reshard data "
4612  "away and try again.\n", node->ip, node->port);
4613  return 0;
4614  }
4615 
4616  // Send CLUSTER FORGET to all the nodes but the node to remove
4617  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> Sending CLUSTER FORGET messages to the "
4618  "cluster...\n");
4619  listIter li;
4620  listNode *ln;
4621  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
4622  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4623  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
4624  if (n == node) continue;
4625  if (n->replicate && !strcasecmp(n->replicate, node_id)) {
4626  // Reconfigure the slave to replicate with some other node
4627  clusterManagerNode *master = clusterManagerNodeWithLeastReplicas();
4628  assert(master != NULL);
4629  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> %s:%d as replica of %s:%d\n",
4630  n->ip, n->port, master->ip, master->port);
4631  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n, "CLUSTER REPLICATE %s",
4632  master->name);
4633  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, NULL);
4634  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
4635  if (!success) return 0;
4636  }
4637  redisReply *r = CLUSTER_MANAGER_COMMAND(n, "CLUSTER FORGET %s",
4638  node_id);
4639  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(n, r, NULL);
4640  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
4641  if (!success) return 0;
4642  }
4643 
4644  // Finally shutdown the node
4645  clusterManagerLogInfo(">>> SHUTDOWN the node.\n");
4646  redisReply *r = redisCommand(node->context, "SHUTDOWN");
4647  success = clusterManagerCheckRedisReply(node, r, NULL);
4648  if (r) freeReplyObject(r);
4649  return success;
4650 invalid_args:
4651  fprintf(stderr, CLUSTER_MANAGER_INVALID_HOST_ARG);
4652  return 0;
4653 }

4686 static int clusterManagerCommandReshard(int argc, char **argv) {
4687  int port = 0;
4688  char *ip = NULL;
4689  if (!getClusterHostFromCmdArgs(argc, argv, &ip, &port)) goto invalid_args;
4690  clusterManagerNode *node = clusterManagerNewNode(ip, port);
4691  if (!clusterManagerLoadInfoFromNode(node, 0)) return 0;
4692  clusterManagerCheckCluster(0);
4693  if (cluster_manager.errors && listLength(cluster_manager.errors) > 0) {
4694  fflush(stdout);
4695  fprintf(stderr,
4696  "*** Please fix your cluster problems before resharding\n");
4697  return 0;
4698  }
4699  int slots = config.cluster_manager_command.slots;
4700  if (!slots) {
4701  while (slots <= 0 || slots > CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS) {
4702  printf("How many slots do you want to move (from 1 to %d)? ",
4703  CLUSTER_MANAGER_SLOTS);
4704  fflush(stdout);
4705  char buf[6];
4706  int nread = read(fileno(stdin),buf,6);
4707  if (nread <= 0) continue;
4708  int last_idx = nread - 1;
4709  if (buf[last_idx] != '\n') {
4710  int ch;
4711  while ((ch = getchar()) != '\n' && ch != EOF) {}
4712  }
4713  buf[last_idx] = '\0';
4714  slots = atoi(buf);
4715  }
4716  }
4717  char buf[255];
4718  char *to = config.cluster_manager_command.to,
4719  *from = config.cluster_manager_command.from;
4720  while (to == NULL) {
4721  printf("What is the receiving node ID? ");
4722  fflush(stdout);
4723  int nread = read(fileno(stdin),buf,255);
4724  if (nread <= 0) continue;
4725  int last_idx = nread - 1;
4726  if (buf[last_idx] != '\n') {
4727  int ch;
4728  while ((ch = getchar()) != '\n' && ch != EOF) {}
4729  }
4730  buf[last_idx] = '\0';
4731  if (strlen(buf) > 0) to = buf;
4732  }
4733  int raise_err = 0;
4734  clusterManagerNode *target = clusterNodeForResharding(to, NULL, &raise_err);
4735  if (target == NULL) return 0;
4736  list *sources = listCreate();
4737  list *table = NULL;
4738  int all = 0, result = 1;
4739  if (from == NULL) {
4740  printf("Please enter all the source node IDs.\n");
4741  printf(" Type 'all' to use all the nodes as source nodes for "
4742  "the hash slots.\n");
4743  printf(" Type 'done' once you entered all the source nodes IDs.\n");
4744  while (1) {
4745  printf("Source node #%lu: ", listLength(sources) + 1);
4746  fflush(stdout);
4747  int nread = read(fileno(stdin),buf,255);
4748  if (nread <= 0) continue;
4749  int last_idx = nread - 1;
4750  if (buf[last_idx] != '\n') {
4751  int ch;
4752  while ((ch = getchar()) != '\n' && ch != EOF) {}
4753  }
4754  buf[last_idx] = '\0';
4755  if (!strcmp(buf, "done")) break;
4756  else if (!strcmp(buf, "all")) {
4757  all = 1;
4758  break;
4759  } else {
4760  clusterManagerNode *src =
4761  clusterNodeForResharding(buf, target, &raise_err);
4762  if (src != NULL) listAddNodeTail(sources, src);
4763  else if (raise_err) {
4764  result = 0;
4765  goto cleanup;
4766  }
4767  }
4768  }
4769  } else {
4770  char *p;
4771  while((p = strchr(from, ',')) != NULL) {
4772  *p = '\0';
4773  if (!strcmp(from, "all")) {
4774  all = 1;
4775  break;
4776  } else {
4777  clusterManagerNode *src =
4778  clusterNodeForResharding(from, target, &raise_err);
4779  if (src != NULL) listAddNodeTail(sources, src);
4780  else if (raise_err) {
4781  result = 0;
4782  goto cleanup;
4783  }
4784  }
4785  from = p + 1;
4786  }
4787  /* Check if there's still another source to process. */
4788  if (!all && strlen(from) > 0) {
4789  if (!strcmp(from, "all")) all = 1;
4790  if (!all) {
4791  clusterManagerNode *src =
4792  clusterNodeForResharding(from, target, &raise_err);
4793  if (src != NULL) listAddNodeTail(sources, src);
4794  else if (raise_err) {
4795  result = 0;
4796  goto cleanup;
4797  }
4798  }
4799  }
4800  }
4801  listIter li;
4802  listNode *ln;
4803  if (all) {
4804  listEmpty(sources);
4805  listRewind(cluster_manager.nodes, &li);
4806  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4807  clusterManagerNode *n = ln->value;
4808  if (n->flags & CLUSTER_MANAGER_FLAG_SLAVE || n->replicate)
4809  continue;
4810  if (!sdscmp(n->name, target->name)) continue;
4811  listAddNodeTail(sources, n);
4812  }
4813  }
4814  if (listLength(sources) == 0) {
4815  fprintf(stderr, "*** No source nodes given, operation aborted.\n");
4816  result = 0;
4817  goto cleanup;
4818  }
4819  printf("\nReady to move %d slots.\n", slots);
4820  printf(" Source nodes:\n");
4821  listRewind(sources, &li);
4822  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4823  clusterManagerNode *src = ln->value;
4824  sds info = clusterManagerNodeInfo(src, 4);
4825  printf("%s\n", info);
4826  sdsfree(info);
4827  }
4828  printf(" Destination node:\n");
4829  sds info = clusterManagerNodeInfo(target, 4);
4830  printf("%s\n", info);
4831  sdsfree(info);
4832  table = clusterManagerComputeReshardTable(sources, slots);
4833  printf(" Resharding plan:\n");
4834  clusterManagerShowReshardTable(table);
4835  if (!(config.cluster_manager_command.flags &
4836  CLUSTER_MANAGER_CMD_FLAG_YES))
4837  {
4838  printf("Do you want to proceed with the proposed "
4839  "reshard plan (yes/no)? ");
4840  fflush(stdout);
4841  char buf[4];
4842  int nread = read(fileno(stdin),buf,4);
4843  buf[3] = '\0';
4844  if (nread <= 0 || strcmp("yes", buf) != 0) {
4845  result = 0;
4846  goto cleanup;
4847  }
4848  }
4849  int opts = CLUSTER_MANAGER_OPT_VERBOSE;
4850  listRewind(table, &li);
4851  while ((ln = listNext(&li)) != NULL) {
4852  clusterManagerReshardTableItem *item = ln->value;
4853  char *err = NULL;
4854  result = clusterManagerMoveSlot(item->source, target, item->slot,
4855  opts, &err);
4856  if (!result) {
4857  if (err != NULL) {
4858  //clusterManagerLogErr("\n%s\n", err);
4859  zfree(err);
4860  }
4861  goto cleanup;
4862  }
4863  }
4864 cleanup:
4865  listRelease(sources);
4866  clusterManagerReleaseReshardTable(table);
4867  return result;
4868 invalid_args:
4869  fprintf(stderr, CLUSTER_MANAGER_INVALID_HOST_ARG);
4870  return 0;
4871 }
